Posts.Content: Jan 14, 2009 03:34PM oldfarm5 wrote: Hey Liza!  You'll do fine.  As others have said side effects to all treatments for BC are very individual.  Increase your protien as amino acids are building blocks for tissue repair.  Also, I was given Radiogel - used it every day after rads.  Beware of underwire bras - a friend suggested cotton camisoles with built in support.  I had 33 radiation treatments - the final 7 being "boosts" to the tumor bed.  I felt severe fatigue at week 5.  You'll work through it - we all do.  Take care of your skin, take care of yourself, get lots of rest, hydrate well.
Posts.Title: side effects of radiation therapy Maria217 Imasurvivor
